author: dandiep
msg: Make JUnit an optional dependency. It is now needed for the test package.

author: dandiep
msg: o Add response capability to the LocalTransport
o Add AbstractCXFTest for CXF developers and users to play messages against
a service. GreeterTest now uses it and properly fails.
o Add an XPathAssert utils class for AbstractCXFTest
o Add DOMUtils for XPath Assertions

author: dkulp
msg: Call output chain
* Add Bus to exchange so it can be looked up later
* Move POST_INVOKE to "in" chain so cleanup can be done even if no output

author: dandiep
msg: Add missing file.

author: dandiep
msg: o Add ClassLoaderUtils which loads classes from the correct classloaders.
If you need to do classloading, please use this as it handles the various
appservers correctly.
o Improve Service construction - put a Method in the OperationInfo for doing
invocations.
o Add SimpleMethodInvoker which invokes the service. This will definitely be
replace later by something which supports different scopes/factorys.
o Add a URIResolver to correct resolve URIs off the filesystem, classpath,
or from a remote location.
o Fix a minor bug in WSDLServiceBuilder where an operation wasn't be
recognized as wrapped if it didn't have any message parts.
o Fix WrappedInInterceptor to work with messages that don't have any message
parts.
o Move GreeterImpl to testutils as both the JAX-WS and Systests module use
it.
o Add an invocation count to GreeterImpl. We are actually invoking the
service now so assertEquals(1, greeter.getInvocationCount()) passes! :-)
